recipe.xml:id: Butter Beans, Paprika and Piquillo Peppers (2)
recipe.intro: These beans are great in salads. Let the mix cool and then toss through a selection of salad leaves and herbs. Perk up the leaves with a little olive oil and vinegar and some crispy lavash on top.

directions.step: Step 1 In a wide-based pan over a medium heat, caramelize the red onions in for or until they turn golden and soft. Add a little fine salt, the garlic and spices and continue to cook for Add the tomato purée and cook for another minute.
Step 2 Add the beans and sherry vinegar and reduce the liquid by half over a medium heat. Turn the heat off. Add the piquillo peppers and the remaining olive oil and season with salt to serve.
